| History                 = W.E.S.P.E. was a terrorist organization located in Germany which was shut down by [[Adam Brashear (Earth-616)|Blue Marvel]] and [[Markus Ettlinger (Earth-616)|Captain Germany]].{{r|Mighty Avengers Vol 2 4.INH}}

It was later revealed [[Max Brashear (Earth-616)|Dr. Positron]] used to work for them in order to fund his plans, who used what was left of W.E.S.P.E.'s equipment as his own.{{r|Mighty Avengers Vol 2 8}}

| Notes                   = * W.E.S.P.E. members seem to hate [[Hydra (Earth-616)|Hydra]] because of their devotion to Nazism while they consider themselves nihilists who believe in nothing.{{r|Captain America and the Mighty Avengers Vol 1 6}}
| Trivia                  = * "Wespe" is the German word for wasp.
